thread.title: Steel Panther: People Might Call Us Comedy Act, But Ultimately We Bring Something Most Bands Can't [News]
thread.title_full: Steel Panther: People Might Call Us Comedy Act, But Ultimately We Bring Something Most Bands Can't [News]

title: Steel Panther: People Might Call Us Comedy Act, But Ultimately We Bring Something Most Bands Can't [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 11 hours ago 17 
Satchel said that despite being labeled a comedy act, Steel Panther still deliver something that's ultimately quite real, something most other bands simply can't offer. 
The guitarist told Metal Wani : "There's people that call us a parody band, or that we're a bunch of jokey jokey guys, but ultimately what we're doing is - we're bringing a very fucking real party to your neighborhood. 
"It gives people a license to act in a way they wouldn't be able to act at work, or at home, or at Christmas time with their family. 
"At any other concert or band you'd go to, you have to keep your clothes on, and only cheer at certain points of the show. With Steel Panther, all the rules goes out the window. You can take your clothes off, you can make out with people you don't know, it doesn't matter. It's all fun. Everybody at our show is there to have fun. 
"It's like one big happy incestuous family that likes to do drugs together, it's crazy."You can check out Steel Panther's latest video "Poontang Boomerang" below, new album "Lower the Bar" coming on March 24.
